mapper.select: select cartNum, p.productNum, productName, price, cartAmount, price*cartAmount money from member m, cart c, product p where m.userID = c.userID and c.productNum=p.productNum and c.userID=#{userID} order by productName
mapper.update: update cart set cartAmount=#{cartAmount} where cartNum=#{cartNum}
mapper.select: select productName, sum(price*cartAmount) money from cart c, product p where c.productNum=p.productNum group by productName order by productName
